t:
I've been in coma for quite some time now.
Finally, my family decided to pull the plug.

But I'm still conscious and can feel everything even after they let me go.


As my flesh starts boiling,
my skin withering and blackening,
the painful and agonizing experience makes me think,
why did I never ask to not be
cremated.
c:
Do you want to be cremated or buried?
